title: Basket with Cover
description: Rounded ovoid shape; lip 5 areas of dark fibers alternating with light fibers; body decorated with checkerboard design in dark fibers on one end, one long side and approximately 1/3 of oppposite long side; remainder of body decorated with 2 rows of dark zigzags; cover decorated with row of footed diamonds
creditline: The William Hood Dunwoody Fund and the Putnam Dana McMillan Fund
